info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

get.description: Retrieve a list of AuthorizationDocuments belonging to the account initiating the request.

parameters.description: The email address of the AuthorizationDocument resources to read
parameters.name: Email

parameters.description: The status of the AuthorizationDocument resources to read
parameters.name: Status

post.description: Create an AuthorizationDocument for authorizing the hosting of phone number capabilities on our platform.

parameters.description: The SID of the Address resource that is associated with the AuthorizationDocument resource to create
parameters.name: AddressSid

parameters.description: The E.164 formatted phone number of the person who will sign the new authorization document
parameters.name: ContactPhoneNumber

parameters.description: The formal title of the person who will sign the authorization document
parameters.name: ContactTitle

parameters.description: The email address that the new authorization document should be sent to for signing
parameters.name: Email

parameters.description: A list of HostedNumberOrder SIDs that the new authorization document will authorize
parameters.name: HostedNumberOrderSids

parameters.description: The email addresses that the new authorization document should be copied to
parameters.name: CcEmails

delete.description: Delete the AuthorizationDocument and remove any associations with HostedNumberOrders.

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource to update
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Address resource that is associated with the AuthorizationDocument resource to update
parameters.name: AddressSid

parameters.description: The email addresses that the authorization document should be copied to
parameters.name: CcEmails

parameters.description: The email address that the authorization document should be sent to
parameters.name: Email

parameters.description: The HostedNumberOrder SIDs that the authorization document will authorize
parameters.name: HostedNumberOrderSids

parameters.description: The new status of the AuthorizationDocument resource.
parameters.name: Status

get.description: Retrieve a list of HostedNumberOrder resources that belong to the account initiating the request.

parameters.description: The URL of this AuthorizationDocument resource that refers to the DependentOrder resources to read
parameters.name: SigningDocumentSid

parameters.description: The string that identifies the DependentOrder resources to read
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The SID of the IncomingPhoneNumber resource of the DependentOrder resources to read
parameters.name: IncomingPhoneNumberSid

parameters.description: The phone number of the DependentOrder resources to read
parameters.name: PhoneNumber

parameters.description: The status of the DependentOrder resources to read
parameters.name: Status

get.description: Retrieve a list of HostedNumberOrders belonging to the account initiating the request.

parameters.description: The string that identifies the HostedNumberOrder resources to read
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: IncomingPhoneNumber SID
parameters.name: IncomingPhoneNumberSid

parameters.description: The phone numbers of the HostedNumberOrder resources to read
parameters.name: PhoneNumber

parameters.description: The status of the resources to read
parameters.name: Status

post.description: Host a phone number's capability on our platform.

parameters.description: The phone number in E.164 format
parameters.name: PhoneNumber

parameters.description: Specify SMS capability to host.
parameters.name: SmsCapability

parameters.description: The SID of the Account that will create the resource
parameters.name: AccountSid

parameters.description: A string to describe the resource
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: SMS Application SID.
parameters.name: SmsApplicationSid

parameters.description: he HTTP method to use when calling the sms_fallback_url
parameters.name: SmsFallbackMethod

parameters.description: The URL we should call if there is a problem calling the sms_url
parameters.name: SmsFallbackUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method we should use when calling the sms_url
parameters.name: SmsMethod

parameters.description: The URL we should call when the IncomingPhoneNumber receives an SMS message
parameters.name: SmsUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method we should use when calling the status_callback_url
parameters.name: StatusCallbackMethod

parameters.description: The URL to call using the status_callback_method to send status information to your application
parameters.name: StatusCallbackUrl

parameters.description: The number of seconds to wait before initiating the ownership verification call
parameters.name: VerificationCallDelay

parameters.description: The numerical extension to dial when making the ownership verification call
parameters.name: VerificationCallExtension

parameters.description: The SID of the identity document resource that represents the document used to verify ownership of the number to be hosted
parameters.name: VerificationDocumentSid

parameters.description: The method used to verify ownership of the number to be hosted
parameters.name: VerificationType

delete.description: Cancel the HostedNumberOrder (only available when the status is in `twilio-processing`, `received`, `pending-verification`, `verified`, and `pending-loa`).

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A string to describe the resource
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The new status of the resource
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: Seconds (0-60) to wait before initiating the ownership verification call.
parameters.name: VerificationCallDelay

parameters.description: Phone extension to use for ownership verification call.
parameters.name: VerificationCallExtension

parameters.description: Verification Document SID
parameters.name: VerificationDocumentSid

parameters.description: Verification Type.
parameters.name: VerificationType

get.description: Retrieve a list of ProofOfAddresss belonging to the account initiating the request.

parameters.description: The SID of the Address resource that is associated with the ProofOfAddress resource to create
parameters.name: AddressSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Identity resource that is associated with the ProofOfAddress resource.
parameters.name: IdentitySid

post.description: Create an ProofOfAddress for authorizing the hosting of phone number capabilities on our platform.

parameters.description: The SID of the Address resource that is associated with the ProofOfAddress resource to create
parameters.name: AddressSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Identity resource that is associated with the ProofOfAddress resource.
parameters.name: IdentitySid

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the resource
parameters.name: Sid

tags.description: PLEASE NOTE that this is a Beta product that is subject to change. Use it with caution.
tags.name: Beta
